name: understatement
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a statement that describes something in a way that makes it seem less important, serious, bad, etc. than it really is, or the act of making such statements: To say that her resignation was a shock would be an understatement - it caused panic. "It didn't go well? " "That's the understatement of the year/decade/century. It was a disaster." Opposites
exaggeration
overstatement
